summary.pt: Uma imagem vale mesmo mais que mil palavras? Tente descobrir de qual imagem o contador de histórias está falando
summary.en: Is an image really worth a thousand words? Try to find out what image is the storyteller referring to

en: Every round someone will be the storyteller and will pick one of their cards in hands and write a story about it.
The story can be anything they want, a word, a sentence, etc. The goal is to have some players guessing the correct card but not all.
If at least one but not all players choose the right card, the storyteller will score points.
But watch out, before anybody can vote, everyone will see the story and also play a card to trick the other players
If your trick-card gets picked by any other player, you get a point
The game ends when someone score over 30 points.
